name: The message Spread Love not Bomb
description:
Take this "Spread Love not Bomb message" wisely and share it with the people you care about.


I don’t want to talk about the current conflict specifically , I don’t care much about who’s on the right track and the one who’s not.
Humanity is the only stuff that all I care about due to this situation.Being at the end of the edge is a picture that I capture about the humanity itself.

While selfishness took someone to force the truth they believe to others and to fight destructively for that their own truth through the missiles, the rockets and such another stuff of weapons, chaos is the only excess we got of it
Is there no other way that can solve the problem beautifully? yes, there is.

Let’s start to turned out the missiles into a pencil to make something sweet and funny. Let’s start to turned out the rockets to spread out the flowers that people can enjoy when they are sad, cornered by the harshness of life 
and to be used by a poor man as a gift to his first blind date.
Let’s make this world as a play ground for little children that makes them feeling grateful to be a part of this world.

Love is the answer to all the problem we’ve got here. Love is the only cure that can place the humanity back above of all.
